ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | polsubsp.a | |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) |

| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( pmap ` K ) = ( pmap ` K ) |
| 7 | 4, 5, 1, 6, 3 | #P_polval2N | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X C_ A ) -> ( ._|_ ` X ) = ( ( pmap ` K ) ` ( ( oc ` K ) ` ( ( lub ` K ) ` X ) ) ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_hllat | |- ( K e. HL -> K e. Lat ) |

| 15 |  | #P_sstr | |- ( ( X C_ A /\ A C_ ( Base ` K ) ) -> X C_ ( Base ` K ) ) |
| 16 | 14, 15 | #P_mpan2 | |- ( X C_ A -> X C_ ( Base ` K ) ) |
| 17 | 13, 4 | #P_clatlubcl | |- ( ( K e. CLat /\ X C_ ( Base ` K ) ) -> ( ( lub ` K ) ` X ) e. ( Base ` K ) ) |

| 19 | 13, 5 | #P_opoccl | |- ( ( K e. OP /\ ( ( lub ` K ) ` X ) e. ( Base ` K ) ) -> ( ( oc ` K ) ` ( ( lub ` K ) ` X ) ) e. ( Base ` K ) ) |

| 21 | 13, 2, 6 | #P_pmapsub | |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ ( ( oc ` K ) ` ( ( lub ` K ) ` X ) ) e. ( Base ` K ) ) -> ( ( pmap ` K ) ` ( ( oc ` K ) ` ( ( lub ` K ) ` X ) ) ) e. S ) |
| 22 | 9, 20, 21 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X C_ A ) -> ( ( pmap ` K ) ` ( ( oc ` K ) ` ( ( lub ` K ) ` X ) ) ) e. S ) |
| 23 | 7, 22 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X C_ A ) -> ( ._|_ ` X ) e. S ) |
